settings.title:
Nunona
Mama Bites Pre+Postnatal
settings.text:
A delicious real food prenatal vitamin and postnatal lactation bite. Completely replaces the need for synthetic pills and processed lactation cookies. Designed to nourish mom + baby from conception and pregnancy through postpartum and breastfeeding. 1 box = 1 week supply (28 mama bites).

  • Whole Food Plant Based
  • Organic Ingredients
  • No Synthetic Supplements
settings.text_below: Free shipping and returns | 30-Day Money Back Guarantee

settings.title: Do I still need to take a prenatal if I take Nunona?
settings.text: No. Nunona fully replaces your prenatal. Each daily dose delivers the complete spectrum of essential vitamins and minerals recommended for pregnancy, in real food form. There’s no need for synthetic pills, powders, or gummies. Just real nourishment, made simple.

settings.title: What’s the difference between real food and synthetic prenatals?
settings.text: Most prenatal pills are made from petroleum and industrial chemicals. They’re isolated nutrients that your body may not absorb well. Nunona is made entirely from organic, whole foods, so your body recognizes and absorbs nutrients the way nature intended.

settings.title: Will Nunona make me nauseous like other prenatals?
settings.text: No. Because Nunona is made from real food, not synthetic isolates, it’s much easier on your stomach. Many customers say it’s the first prenatal they’ve ever kept down.

settings.title: When should I start taking Nunona?
settings.text: Ideally, before conception, nutrient stores like folate and choline are critical during the earliest stages of fetal development. But if you’re already pregnant, it’s never too late to start. Every bite supports your baby’s growth and your body’s reserves.

settings.title: Why is Nunona better than lactation cookies?
settings.text: Because cookies are dessert, not nutrition. Nunona delivers the full spectrum of nutrients your body needs to recover and support milk nutrients, without added sugar, seed oils, or processed flour.

settings.title: Is Nunona gluten-free, dairy-free, or soy-free?
settings.text: Yes. Nunona is free from gluten, dairy, and soy, but does contain peanuts and tree nuts.

settings.title: Our Story
settings.text:
Nunona was born from a simple but powerful belief: your baby’s nutrition shouldn’t be synthetic.

As a nutrition expert, I spent years developing products for babies around the world. But when I became pregnant, I searched for a prenatal I could trust, and all I found were synthetic supplements and ultra-processed formulas.

I wanted something better - organic, whole-food, plant-based nutrition that actually nourished me and my baby. So, I created it. Welcome to Nunona—real food for motherhood, made to be delicious, convenient, and truly nourishing.
